Who We Are ?

we are the one who creates the creators.


The Minimax Dance Studio was born out of the simple idea of "following your dream" and " ♥ about what we do" of course, our love for Dance. What we think is - life is short, don’t spend it doing something you don’t like.


In July 2015, The Minimax Dance Studio was founded by me (Sunny Soni), from the journey of oneness I trained many dancers and most of love ones are with me on the same platform, here we work as a family to train pupils.

"Listen to the music, get the emotion of the track and be free, let your body go with the music and trust me you'll ve better everysecond, everyminute, everyhour, everyday."

Hip-hop is a very energetic form of dancing. It is unique in that, it allows its dancers to perform with freedom of movement, adding in their own personalities.

Timing : 12:00
Price : 1000

Kathak, one of the most elegant dance forms of India, it is based on fast footwork and even swift spin and focuses on the element of storytelling.

Timing : 12:00
Price : 1000

K.R.U.M.P., which is an acronym for Kingdom Radically Uplifted Mighty Praise, presenting krumping as a faith-based artform.It originates in Los Angelas, California in the South Central.

Timing : 12:00
Price : 1000

Salsa is a dance with Caribbean and African roots.Salsa originated in the 1900s in Cuba, where rhythms from styles like Cuban Son and Afro-Cuban.
